extendedInfo.description: In 2010, Detroit Sports Nation started in the same way many a great night has, in a dimly lit bar over a couple beers.From that one night, where a simple idea to present sports news from a fanâs perspective was hashed out over a table of beer and peanuts to the grand scope of everything that Detroit Sports Nation encompasses today, is simply mind blowing.With a strong focus on local teams, Detroit Sports Nation beat writers are dedicated to bringing everything from breaking news, to scores and schedules to the masses. Each member of the DSN Writing Team works tirelessly and completely volunteer, they do it out of their love of the game, there is something to say about that.FEATURES:* Instant access to the DSN Facebook and Twitter pages* Full Access to website content* Access Scores from your favorite Detroit teams* Get the latest event news from local entertainment venues* Upload your photos or take a new photo repping the D * Stay up to date on everything happing in the Detroit sports world.
